Author: r00telement
Name: Player Tags
Description: Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat. Create custom tags and add them to players with the context menu.
Changelog:
- Overhauled tag editor.
- Added visibility properties for activities: pve duties, pvp duties, others.
- Added visibility properties for players: self, friends, party members, alliance members, enemies, others.
- Added text glow color property.
- Added Quick Tag feature to quickly tag nearby players.
- Added Tagged Players feature to see a list of all players you have tagged.
- Added context menu integration to add and remove custom tags for players when right clicking them.
